alert.note: Alert for Clark; Codington; Hamlin (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Aberdeen (Northern and Northeastern South Dakota)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 25 at 10:58PM MDT by NWS Aberdeen
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Hamlin, east central Clark and southwestern Codington Counties through 1245 AM CDT... At 1157 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Naples, or 12 miles southeast of Clark, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Vienna around 1210 AM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Hazel and Kellerton Church. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 100 AM CDT for northeastern South Dakota.
